name: Ben Skea
testimonial: JobTrackr has completely transformed how I manage my job applications. The drag-and-drop feature for updating job statuses is a huge time-saver. It's easy to track everything, and the CV upload made applying for jobs faster than ever. I landed my role at Price & Myers in no time!

name: Caroline Dickinson
testimonial: I used JobTrackr during my job search, and it helped me stay organized and focused. The statistics tab gave me great insights into where I stood, and the CV upload was seamless.

name: Natalie Mills
testimonial: The job tracker kept me on top of everything. I could easily see which jobs needed follow-up and which ones I had interviews for. The CV tool saved me hours of work, and I got hired by Tappit thanks to this site's efficiency.

name: Ben Mitchell
testimonial: JobTrackr made my job search smooth and straightforward. The tracker helped me keep all my applications organized, while the statistics tab helped me measure my progress. Thanks to this tool, I found my role at Barclays in just a couple of months!
